trans-unit.source: Imports standard transport binding elements from [Web Services Description Language](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) (WSDL) documents with attached policy expressions.
trans-unit.target: 從附加原則運算式的 [Web 服務描述語言](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) \(英文\) (WSDL) 文件匯入標準傳輸繫結元素。

trans-unit.source: The `TransportBindingElementImporter` type is an implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: `TransportBindingElementImporter` 型別是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> 介面的實作。

trans-unit.source: It imports the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerTransportBindingElement> instances from WSDL service metadata.
trans-unit.target: 它會從 WSDL 服務中繼資料匯入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerTransportBindingElement> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When these <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> types are imported, the `TransportBindingElementImporter` type also imports the addressing information from the WSDL metadata.
trans-unit.target: 匯入這些 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> 型別時，`TransportBindingElementImporter` 型別也會從 WSDL 中繼資料匯入定址資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElementImporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElementImporter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter" /> that performs the import.
trans-unit.target: 執行匯入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> for the contract binding element.
trans-unit.target: 合約繫結項目的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Imports a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> instance from the policy attached to the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: 從附加至 WSDL 繫結的原則匯入 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The collection of WSDL documents that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入之 WSDL 文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of XML Schema documents that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入之 XML 結構描述文件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of policy assertions that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入之原則判斷提示的集合。

trans-unit.source: Adds custom policy assertions to the WSDL bindings in WSDL documents that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: 將自訂原則判斷提示加入至要匯入之 WSDL 文件中的 WSDL 繫結。

trans-unit.source: This method attaches a policy expression to WSDL bindings that already have attached policies.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將原則運算式附加至已經附加原則的 WSDL 繫結。

trans-unit.source: The added policy expression contains a custom policy assertion that contains the SOAP transport URI from the SOAP binding.
trans-unit.target: 新增的原則運算式包含自訂原則判斷提示，其中包含來自 SOAP 繫結的 SOAP 傳輸 URI。

trans-unit.source: This policy assertion is used when importing the endpoint to import the correct transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: 匯入端點時會應用這個原則判斷提示，以便匯入正確的傳輸繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> that performs the import.
trans-unit.target: 執行匯入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> for the contract binding element.
trans-unit.target: 合約繫結項目的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> interface and does not contain any functionality.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會實作為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> 介面的一部分，且不包含任何功能。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> that performs the import.
trans-unit.target: 執行匯入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> for the contract binding element.
trans-unit.target: 合約繫結項目的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Imports addressing information from the WSDL port and imports an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement" /> or an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement" /> from the SOAP transport URI if a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> is not already imported from policy attached to the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未從附加至 WSDL 的原則匯入 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement" />，便從 WSDL 連接埠匯入定址資訊並從 SOAP 傳輸 URI 匯入 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not import addressing information attached to the WSDL if the imported binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> that is not imported by this type.
trans-unit.target: 如果匯入的繫結包含不是由此型別匯入的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>，這個方法就不會匯入附加至 WSDL 的定址資訊。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" />.Endpoint.Binding is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" />.Endpoint.Binding 為 <see langword="null" />。
